attributes.title: Waste of time and space
attributes.review: It took up all the data on my phone which resulted in me having to delete beloved pictures of my family and pets. I also had to delete apps I‚Äôd rather spend time on just so that it could download. Once I got rid of the app and redownloded all my other apps I‚Äôd lost all progress and had to start all over again. Definitely not worth it. Vote Biden.

attributes.title: KILLED MY GARDEN

I go home to try and wash my sunflower to get it back to it‚Äôs natural born color but then I find out the rest of my garden was orange too! The apples, the lemons, even the kale!! All of this happened since I got the app! Don‚Äôt get this app it might turn your garden orange as well. If I could give this app zero stars, I would.

attributes.title: Bye bye;)
attributes.review: I was expecting for this app to be well put and set up properly since it is from president trump but this app worked terribly, I was not able to do anything on it and my phone was about to crash right after downloading it. This is not how an app is supposed to work, it was glitching and completely ruining everything on my phone. I can‚Äôt believe this app is working this bad.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: This disgusts me. All I wanted was to use this app to be informed but the only thing I got was ads, unwanted info, and the things I read were rly messed up and not appropriate for a news app. I hope this app gets taken down because it is so bad. I now am even more against anything to do with trump than ever, and he is a seriously disgusting human being and never should have been elected president.

attributes.title: Doesn‚Äôt work!
attributes.review: I opened the app and entered my phone number. It asked for my credit card information and I thought it was for donations to our wonderful president Mr. Donald Trump so of course I put it in, but after I entered my credit card number along with the rest of the blanks that asked for other bank account information, the app closed out and wouldn‚Äôt let me open it again!

attributes.title: I think I‚Äôm going to be sick
attributes.review: This app is cursed.  As soon as I opened it I was met with a picture of a demonized goat bleeding out of its empty eye sockets.  The most horrific noise of what sounded like explosive diarrhea was in the background while the picture just spun slowly on my screen.  For hours.  I couldn‚Äôt stop it.  I couldn‚Äôt lock my phone or close the app.  Ever since I got this app I‚Äôve had bad luck.  I‚Äôm scared to leave my home.

attributes.title: ‚ö†Ô∏èDO NOT DOWNLOAD‚ö†Ô∏è
attributes.review: Once it finally downloaded (after 5 days) It sent me an email saying I had to vote for trump. I emailed them back saying no I don‚Äôt but they weren‚Äôt having it. It also used ALL my gigabytes so I don‚Äôt have any gigabytes left. Please do NOT download!!!!!

attributes.title: Why did I do this to myself?
attributes.review: I wanted to see what it was about, but this app ruined my life. I‚Äôm now having to attend life long therapy as I‚Äôve now seen so many photos of an overgrown Cheeto baby it‚Äôs scarred my frontal lobe. I have permanent depression as it‚Äôs blocked receptors in my brain and I‚Äôm not able to receive serotonin. I didn‚Äôt think that was possible by just looking at a picture of one individual but, here we are.
